name: Trellus
headline: Real-time sales coach for SDRs
description:
Trellus delivers simple coaching prompts to your salespeople in real time as they speak to prospects. Prompts are delivered in response to what is happening in a conversation. The goal of these prompts is to get more reps achieving quota and to reduce the time it takes to start attaining quota.

Prompts are action-oriented steps toward empathetic listening and effective discovery. Examples include 'pause' (when talking too much), 'set next steps' (when wrapping up a call without them), and 'ask current state' (when encountering objections).

Trellus is backed by Y Combinator and founded by former MIT researchers.
tags: industry:ai-enhanced-learning; industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:sales; location:new-york

founders.name: Ajinkya Nene, Founder
founders.description: Ajinkya completed his masters and bachelors in computer science from MIT where he focused on applied ML systems. He has experience in running top-level strategy projects as part of his experience at McKinsey & Co. and has been programming for over a decade.

founders.name: Craig Bonnoit, Founder
founders.description: Craig has nearly a decade of professional experience leading teams and developing software. His works has spanned multiple domains including real-time autonomous systems and financial derivative pricing. He previously completed a PhD in Physics at MIT focused on computational techniques for experimental data analysis in strongly correlated materials.

# Supercharge your phone calls
Improve quality, quantity, and visibility into phone calls with AI for calling.

For sales
## Power/Parallel dial inside your SEP
  * Dial with your team in a sales floor
  * Practice calling a bot prospect
  * Get real-time guidance on calls
  * Understand drivers of performance with advanced call analytics


for support
## AI powered bots and humans
  * Handle inbound calls with a bot
  * Ensure human agents stay on message with agent assist
  * Automate post-call QA on 100% of call
  * Capture structured data from phone calls


Superhuman for LinkedIn
## AI powered bots and humans
  * Consolidate LI + Sales Nav
  * Snooze messages
  * Use keyboard shortcuts
  * Auto-fill with snippits
  * Tracking & analysis


free trial
## Have More Great Conversationwith Prospects
Improve quality, quantity, and visibility into phone calls with AI for calling.
AI DIALER
## Parallel dial directly inside your sales engagement platform
Dial up to 5 parallel lines, automate voice drops, and use LinkedIn - all from within one tab inside your SEP. Take the context switching and dial tones out of your life to spend more time talking to real people.
voice agents
## Deploy voice agents for practice or inbound handling
### Sales
Talk to agents that act like your customers to practice new skills or ramp new hires quickly.
### Inbound
Deploy agent to augment phone handling, handling simple conversations and increasing deflections to free up live agents.

real time
## Make the most of every opportunity with an AI coach live on every call
### Sales
Get realtime guidance on objection handling and competitor positioning.
### Support
Improve adherence to script and and increase CSAM.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/633ef5e495fbc54172ea70ad/67ad046309d7fe8dedfbe42a_Real%20Time.avif)
Analytics
## Score and track every conversation
### Sales
Measure your call conversion pipeline and track low effort behaviors.
### Support
Fully automated QA on 100% to ensure compliance and consistent conversations.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/633ef5e495fbc54172ea70ad/67ad1bbf925c6a5e23254eeb_Analytics.avif)
salesfloor
## Bring back a high-energy salesfloor experience for your remote team
Listen to live calls, trade tips and suggestions, and celebrate wins together in a virtual sales floor.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/633ef5e495fbc54172ea70ad/67acfeb1f51f321b2e1b7df6_Salesfloor.avif)
## Take back control of your LinkedIn Inbox and never miss a message again.
See all your LinkedIn Messages including Sales Nav in one place. Organize all your DM’s by snoozing, categorizing, and tracking conversations. Move faster than ever before with snippets and hotkeys.
## Have More Great Conversation with Prospects
Improve quality, quantity, and visibility into phone calls with AI for calling.
[Try for free](https://www.trellus.ai/<https:/chromewebstore.google.com/detail/trellus/enhpjjojmnlnaokmppkkifgaonfojigl>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/633ef5e495fbc54172ea70ad/67b26cc97d592cf9a8976e27_faq-image.avif)
### Paralel dialing
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/633ef5e495fbc54172ea70ad/67b277267fb8e7cdfcf1cf8e_faq-icon.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/633ef5e495fbc54172ea70ad/67b277267fb8e7cdfcf1cf8e_faq-icon.svg)
Convert your existing SEP into a parallel dialer so you can get more productivity out of your current tech stack. Execute dial tasks and sequences 5x faster in parallel, automate dropping voicemails and fill your day with live conversations.
### Voice Agents
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/633ef5e495fbc54172ea70ad/67b277267fb8e7cdfcf1cf8e_faq-icon.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/633ef5e495fbc54172ea70ad/67b277267fb8e7cdfcf1cf8e_faq-icon.svg)
Deploy voice agents to streamline telephony workflows like inbound call routing, intake data collection, appointment setting, and answering support questions. Delight your customers with 24/7 availability and eliminate long hold times.
### Superhuman for LinkedIn
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/633ef5e495fbc54172ea70ad/67b277267fb8e7cdfcf1cf8e_faq-icon.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/633ef5e495fbc54172ea70ad/67b277267fb8e7cdfcf1cf8e_faq-icon.svg)
Take control of your LinkedIn Inbox with a consolidated view across LinkedIn + Sales Nav. Get to inbox zero faster with snippets, snoozing, and keyboard shortcuts.
### Tracking & Analytics
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/633ef5e495fbc54172ea70ad/67b277267fb8e7cdfcf1cf8e_faq-icon.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/633ef5e495fbc54172ea70ad/67b277267fb8e7cdfcf1cf8e_faq-icon.svg)
Automatically score 100% of your team’s calls to identify and track key performance metrics and close the performance gap between bottom and top performers.
### Sales Floor
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/633ef5e495fbc54172ea70ad/67b277267fb8e7cdfcf1cf8e_faq-icon.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/633ef5e495fbc54172ea70ad/67b277267fb8e7cdfcf1cf8e_faq-icon.svg)
Create a high-performance calling culture with a live sales floor. Bring the team together for structured call blitzes or recreate the always on pulse of the sales floor for virtual teams.
### Real Time Coaching
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/633ef5e495fbc54172ea70ad/67b277267fb8e7cdfcf1cf8e_faq-icon.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/633ef5e495fbc54172ea70ad/67b277267fb8e7cdfcf1cf8e_faq-icon.svg)
Make the most of every conversation with adaptive live guidance during calls. Get started instantly with prebuilt scenarios for common objections or customize the system to implement your own talk tracks.
### Practice Voice Bots
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/633ef5e495fbc54172ea70ad/67b277267fb8e7cdfcf1cf8e_faq-icon.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/633ef5e495fbc54172ea70ad/67b277267fb8e7cdfcf1cf8e_faq-icon.svg)
Ramp quickly with AI voice agents that act like your prospects. Create agents from your team’s past calls in seconds to codify and share learning across your team.
### Number Health
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/633ef5e495fbc54172ea70ad/67b277267fb8e7cdfcf1cf8e_faq-icon.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/633ef5e495fbc54172ea70ad/67b277267fb8e7cdfcf1cf8e_faq-icon.svg)
Dial with great numbers and automate number health checks and number rotation as you dial to stay out of spam lists and boost connection rate.

generated_description:
### Trellus: Your Real-Time Sales Coach

Founded in 2022 and launched through Y Combinator’s W22 batch, Trellus is armed with a mission: to provide real-time coaching for Sales Development Representatives (SDRs). This New York-based startup is on a mission to elevate the sales game by empowering reps with immediate, actionable coaching prompts during their conversations with prospects.

#### The Problem

Sales is a tough game, and hitting quotas can feel like running a marathon without a plan. Many salespeople struggle to engage effectively during calls, where missteps can mean the difference between closing a deal or losing a prospect. That's where Trellus enters the picture.

#### The Solution

Trellus delivers simple yet effective coaching prompts exactly when they’re needed—while sales conversations are happening. Imagine being in the moment and getting nudges like “pause” when you're dominating the conversation or “set next steps” when wrapping up a call. These are not generic tips; they are tailored responses to real-time interactions. The goal? To help more salespeople meet or exceed their quotas faster and with less ramp-up time.

#### The Tech Behind Trellus

Trellus is built by former MIT researchers and leverages artificial intelligence to enhance the learning experience for sales teams. Not just about whispers in their ears, the platform offers analytical tools to track performance and improve skills over time. The tools include:

- **AI Coach**: Provides live feedback on handling objections and competitor positioning.
- **Parallel Dialing & Voice Agents**: Streamlines outbound calls, allowing for simultaneous dialing, and uses AI to simulate customer interactions for training.
- **Sales Floor**: Creates a virtual space for teams to connect, share strategies, and celebrate wins collectively, making remote work feel less isolating.

#### What’s Next for Trellus?

With a compact team of three, Trellus is already making waves in the B2B sales sector. As they continue to refine their approach, their aim is to further reduce barriers to effective communication in sales and transform SDR training into a more dynamic, results-oriented process.

If you’re looking to supercharge your sales team with real-time insights driven by artificial intelligence, Trellus is worth a look. For more information, check out their website: [Trellus](https://www.trellus.ai).

---

Above all, Trellus embodies the spirit of innovation in sales coaching—effortlessly combining AI with empathy to create a smarter, more responsive sales force.
